Description:
Country Style Cottage
Prepare to fall in love with this immaculately presented cottage, in a superb location. With a warm and inviting feel, the covered veranda welcomes you home and inside you will adore the charming touches that truly make this house a home.
Comprising of 2 generous bedrooms, a country style kitchen with gas cooking and plenty of cupboard space, a large lounge with gas log fire to keep you cosy on those cooler winter nights, plus ceiling fans throughout to accommodate in the warmer months.
To the exterior of the home, there are delightful yet easy to maintain gardens with an arbour feature, a garden shed and workshop plus an oversized tandem carport all situated on a 502m2 (approx.) block.
This gorgeous home is ideally located towards the end of a no through road and within walking distance to schools, shops and public transport.

Description:
Remarkably Original And Ready To Renew On 890sqm (Approx.)
Lovingly maintained and comfortable in its current state, this endearing home is more than suitable to live in while you think about the many possibilities on approximately 890sqm.
Popular with families, this location offers excellent access on foot to nearby parklands, leading schools and the town centre.
~ Master bedroom offers a walk-in-robe and ensuite.
~ Two remaining bedrooms with built-in-robes.
~ Combined dining and functional kitchen, consisting of brand new appliances; Dishlex dishwasher, double fridge cavity and Chef oven.
~ Spacious lounge room.
~ Ducted heating throughout.
~ The outdoor entertaining area overlooks the large backyard, offering a blank canvas to extend or build a shed (S.T.C.A.)
~ Side access to a single garage with a rear roller door to the yard.

Vendors on the move!
Property features include:
- Private master bedroom with WIR and en suite
- 2 Spare bedrooms both with BIR
- Family bathroom with separate WC
- Open plan kitchen with stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, gas cooker and electric oven

Description:
Newly Built Home- NO Body Corp fees
Only a year and a half young, this three-bedroom home sits on a private block and offers its new owner a functional and modern layout.
Property highlights include;
- Master bedroom with walk-in robe and en-suite as well as two further bedrooms with double built-in robes
- Open kitchen with stainless steel appliances
- Two separate living areas; Formal lounge to the front of the home with a second open plan living zone flowing out onto the huge undercover entertaining area
- Family bathroom with separate toilet and ducted heating throughout the home
- Double remote lock-up garage plus an additional open car space
- Low maintenance yard
Set on a 508m2 (approx.) block with only minutes to local schools, public transport and shops, make your move and start to enjoy all that Crib Point has to offer.
To register your interest, please contact Katie on 0437 284 449.

Description:
Under Offer - Crib Point Cottage
Situated down a quiet, no through road on a leafy & generous allotment of approximately 1012sqm this 2 bedroom, home is bursting with character, charm & potential!
In original yet neat condition, the home offers ample opportunities, some of which could be to renovate, subdivide or re-develop (STCA)... or simply enjoy this gorgeous cottage style home as is and secure a piece of prime real-estate in a fantastic locale!
With a functional L-Shaped lounge, dining and a kitchen that overlooks the tranquil surrounds and hall access to the two bedrooms, bathroom & laundry, this is a great layout to be enjoyed or enhanced. Modern conveniences on offer include split system heating/cooling, ceiling fans, electric heating, gas freestanding oven.
Turn your attention to the impressive exterior of the home, a cute and cosy veranda complements the façade, beautiful greenery and gardens also give the home added privacy. A large garage/shed is located towards the rear of the home at the end of the paved driveway, offering additional car accommodation in the form of off-street parking. A spacious backyard will provide a place for kids and pets to play or the base for your future plans, with ample possibilities!
Conveniently located within close proximity to schools, shops, public transport options and recreational reserves, this is a winning location and an opportunity not to be missed!

Pocket Pleaser
Modern, airy and perfectly proportioned, this much-loved unit is ideal for first home buyers, retirees or those looking for a sea change.
For the weekend, Woolleys Beach Reserve and the esplanade are nearby, as is the convenience of transport and shops just down the road.
~ Enjoying street frontage with it's own driveway, leading to a single garage with internal access.
~ Two generous bedrooms with built-in-robes.
~ Third bedroom or home office.
~ Open plan living and dining space with split system heating & cooling.
~ Modern kitchen consists of a Fisher & Paykel dishwasher and a double fridge cavity.
~ Spacious bathroom with a separate bath and shower.
~ Outdoor entertaining area and a low maintenance yard.

Description:
4 LOT SUBDIVISION (S.T.C.A)
What an opportunity to arise!
A beautiful 3,295 sqm block (over 3/4 acre) with all services available located in a quiet area of the ever growing Crib Point and ideally situated within the General Residential Zone this property boasts plenty of potential with options including:-
- Potential subdivision into 4 lots (S.T.C.A.)
- Renovate the existing home and enjoy the peaceful lifestyle available AND still subdivide some of the land to pocket the profits and fund the renovation.
- Demolish the existing house and design & build that dream home you've always wanted.
This fantastic property currently has a 2 bedroom weatherboard home in need of some TLC or an easy demolition, if you would prefer to build your own home.
Also included with the sale is a brilliant, fully self contained relocatable one bedroom bungalow which could be utilised whilst building/renovating or again another win, by selling and pocketing the money.
It doesn't get much better than this!
Contact, Richard Whitehead on 0412 328 718 for expression of Interest form & details or for further information on the property.
Terms: 10% Deposit. Balance 120 Days. Vacant Possession.

Description:
Privacy, Space and Comfort.
Boasting all the elements of an honest family home, this property offers plenty of privacy and space and is set on a substantial 1,610m2 block.
With generously proportioned living areas, this well maintained residence includes:
- A generous family lounge with study nook.
- Timber kitchen with stainless steel wall oven, gas cook top and dishwasher; plus plenty of bench and cupboard space.
- A family and dining room which opens to an undercover outdoor entertaining area, overlooking the expansive backyard.
- 4 Bedrooms including master bedroom with ensuite and walk in robe.
- Central heating and Cooling. Quality window furnishings
- Double carport and powered workshop.
- Side rear access and loads of off street parking.
Surrounded by beautiful established gardens and set in a quiet street, 96 Disney St is within close proximity to public transport, local Schools, HMAS Cerberus and will suit a variety of buyers.

Description:
Entertainers Paradise On a Quarter Acre!
Finding the perfect home that ticks all the boxes can be hard, but look no further, this is the one! Situated in a leafy and sought after pocket of Crib Point, this generous four bedroom home ticks all the boxes and more. Sitting upon a spacious allotment of 1021sqm (Approx.) this family friendly sized home has an equally proportioned backyard and outdoor living zone that will be sure to suit everyone's needs!
The solid brick home is younger than most in the area and offers multiple living areas plus study and a further three bedrooms and master with WIR & ensuite, providing room for the growing or established family. The large open plan kitchen boasts stainless steel appliances and ample cupboard space, whilst overlooking the family dining and living area, all of which provide an ambient outlook to the rear yard and outdoor entertaining area. With modern conveniences such as ducted heating & split system cooling, you will be kept comfortable all year around, no matter the season.
To the outside of the home, this is a true entertainer's delight! Look no further than the undercover alfresco area, with mains gas built in BBQ and zip track blinds, outdoor heater and extended cover with a shade sail area, all conveniently accessible to the large in ground solar heated swimming pool and the perfect place for a fire pit area. For added access the property offers side gates, to a garden shed and a double lock up garage with ample off street parking. Last but not least the home has 16 Solar Panels, making this property even more appealing, with nothing left to do but move in & enjoy!

Description:
Family Home With A Generous Floorplan & Plenty Of Potential!
Set on a generous 840sqm block and absolutely brimming with potential, this brick veneer home has outstanding bones and needs little visualisation to see the opportunities it presents.
This popular location is within an easy walk of schools, transport and the recreation reserve.
~ Master bedroom with a walk-in-robe and ensuite.
~ Three remaining bedrooms with built-in-robes.
~ Combined kitchen and meals area, offering a dishwasher and gas cooktop.
~ Central lounge room with a wood heater.
~ Formal dining room consisting of a ceiling fan and Rinnai heater.
~ Side access to a double carport and a garden shed in the large rear yard.

Description:
Single level in a secured location
A great opportunity to downsize, start or add to your investment portfolio, with this 2 bedroom brick veneer and double lock up garage unit. North facing open plan kitchen, meals and family room leading out to a landscaped courtyard. A gated unit complex that is well maintained by a long term tenant that would be more than happy to continue their lease.
Do not delay your inspection the vendors wants this property sold!

Description:
Substantial Family Retreat With Dual-Living On ½ Acre (Approx.)
Impressive in every aspect, from its family friendly layout to its relaxed outdoor spaces, this enormous home delivers lifestyle, space and serenity in one of Crib Point's most sought-after pockets.
~ Nestled on a generous 1,940sqm (approx.) corner allotment with leafy vistas from every window.
~ The spacious parents retreat features a walk-in-robe, full ensuite with spa bath and roller shutters, ideal for shift workers.
~ Three additional bedrooms with built-in-robes. Plus, home office or fifth bedroom with new carpet.
~ Showcasing a light and bright formal living space and separately zoned theatre room.
~ There is the welcome bonus of a second sitting room and a casual meals area adjoining the open plan kitchen with caesarstone benchtops, dishwasher, Fisher & Paykel freestanding oven and a double fridge cavity.
~ Powder room for guest convenience.
~ Climate controlled by ducted heating and evaporative cooling throughout.
~ Immersed in established gardens and child-friendly lawns, the entertainer's alfresco is the perfect spot to relax while overlooking the sparkling, salt-chlorinated swimming pool.
~ The free-standing cottage is an invaluable asset to the property, and could be used in a number of ways to accommodate a growing family. With its own direct access via a side gate, the cottage features a lounge room with split system heating & cooling, bathroom, enormous bedroom/retreat, and a kitchenette & dining space.
~ Other notable features include a double garage with internal access, 20,000lt water tank and a chook pen.

Description:
Delightful Cottage with Established Private Garden
Contact Sean for your private inspection!
Only 2 years old, this cute home is super energy efficient, with large windows in every room overlooking the delightful, securely-fenced garden and full length verandah.
Still under builders warranty.
Features Include:
- Smeg stainless steel appliances
- Reverse cycle air con/heater
- 2 spacious bedrooms with built in robes
- Handy bathroom/laundry combination with the toilet supplemented by rainwater tank
- High clearance single carport (perfect for campers and RV's)
- Garden shed, fruit trees and fully paved driveway for all weather access complete this lovely setting in a quiet, sought after pocket of Crib point!

Address: 283 Stony Point Road Crib Point VIC 3919
Description:
Spacious, Convenient & Packed With Promise On 1/4 Acre (Approx.)
A family-friendly layout, spacious living zones and a wonderfully convenient location define this lovely residence on approximately 1,011sqm. The home has been prepared for your immediate enjoyment, yet offers the potential for cosmetic enhancements in the future.
Getting around will be easy. The bus and train service both have stops nearby. The town centre is just down the road, and local schools and sporting clubs are a short 10-minute walk away.
~ Three bedrooms, master with a walk-in-robe, ensuite and ceiling fan.
~ The fourth bedroom is located in the outdoor studio, complete with air-conditioning.
~ The living room is welcoming and comfortable, and includes space for a formal dining setting.
~ Casual meals area and a lovely boutique kitchen with Nobel cooking appliances and plenty of bench and cupboard space.
~ Stretching out from the kitchen, sliding doors deliver a seamless transition to a paved, covered alfresco and an enormous rear yard, complete with landscaped gardens, fruit trees, chook pen and a garden shed.
~ Climate controlled by a wood coonara heater, gas wall heater, ceiling fans and split system heating & cooling in the living spaces.
~ Double carport, large lock-up shed with power and ample room to store a boat or caravan.

Address: 261 Stony Point Road Crib Point VIC 3919
Description:
Period Detail With Modern Elegance on 1/4 Acre (Approx.)
Be prepared to fall in love at first sight, this gorgeous cottage has been completely restored and presents as brand new; beautifully blending the charm of a bygone era with the added conveniences of modern living.
Beyond the front door is a welcoming community that is perfect for families. The Crib Point Recreation Reserve and St Joseph's Primary School are nearby, while Morradoo Train Station and the town centre are a short 10 minute walk away.
~ Large master bedroom featuring double built-in-robes, stylish ensuite with a large walk-in shower, and direct access to the gorgeous rear deck.
~ Two additional spacious bedrooms with built-in-robes.
~ Open plan dining and living consisting of a gas heater and ceiling fan.
~ Modern kitchen offers dishwasher, oven and gas cooktop with french doors leading to decked area with a desirable North-East aspect.
~ Generous rear yard with single car garage.
~ Beautiful landscaped front gardens and a blank canvas at the rear to take advantage of.

Description:
Under Contract
Get ready to be wowed, this property is an opportunity not to be missed! Situated amongst beautifully landscaped gardens and mature trees on a massive allotment of 1,618sqm approx., it is a private hideaway with all the space you could want!
Comprising of 4 bedrooms, including master with built in robes and ensuite, further three bedrooms with built in robes, main family bathroom & separate toilet, laundry with yard access, kitchen and meals area and a large and separate lounge.
The kitchen has been updated in recent years, with glass splashback, stainless steel appliances and neutral cabinetry and bench tops which blends well with the homes subtle palette. Opening out onto the undercover pergola area, the kitchen and meals area has a wonderful view and will ensure hosting guests is a breeze with the functional layout. With gas wall furnace heating and split system cooling you will be comfortable all year around, no matter the season.
The outside of the home is very impressive and will be sure to please those with boats, caravans, trailers or machinery, as it offers a large double shed with work bench and ample off street parking within the property. With secure fencing separating the initial off street parking from the rear drive and shed, the property is well equipped to accommodate families and tradespeople. With an additional garden shed and veggie garden at the rear you will be delighted by the size of the grounds, with the lush green grass and sweeping birch trees, it is a garden lover's delight!
Located just a short walk from the Crib Point Shops, Schools, public transport and sporting and recreational facilities, this home is positioned perfectly within reach to all you could need!
